name: Knight's move
description:
Knight's move is simple puzzle game where you need to walk a knight so that he is not on the same square twice and goes around all the cells of the chess board. Build knight routes and pump your mind!

- 16 levels (from 5x5 to 20x20)
- all sorts of options on each of them
- pleasant music
- addictive gameplay
- thematic achievements

As soon as possible:
- themed trading cards
- themed backgrounds
- themed emoticons
